text: Giorgio Malinverni is a Swiss law professor. On 27 June 2006, he was elected by the Parliamentary Assembly of the Council of Europe as the judge in respect of Switzerland on the European Court of Human Rights.Swiss government press release of 27 June 2006. ==References== ==External links== *CV at the U.N. title: Giorgio Malinverni
